title: [Self-directed] Virtual Reality-Based Safety Technology Instructional Design: Mathematical Modeling Approach for Children with Autism Spectrum and Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders (Applying Probability, Statistics, and Graph Theory)

context.prior_knowledge: Introduction to foundational education theory, overview of special education, and high school-level mathematics (statistical reasoning, probability theory, graph theory), experience with matrix operations and basic data visualization
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capability to design and evaluate VR educational tools applicable in real classroom settings: A/B testing design for optimizing educational effects through behavioral prediction simulations via mathematical modeling.
